architectural_notes: Share dialog QR generation must use the full canonical share URL string (not a visually truncated display value) when encoding the QR.
known_issues: QR code in Share dialog is not scannable; scanners show no reaction/'no text found' (likely encoding empty/invalid data).
App Link display appears cut off/non-scrollable; may be related to QR being generated from truncated/incorrect value.

existing_features.title: Update the Share dialog to temporarily remove/disable the QR code feature while keeping the rest of the dialog functionality unchanged (App Link display, Copy Link, and Quick Share). Specifically: remove QR canvas rendering and the QR generation hook usage; remove or disable the “Download QR” action; and update the dialog description/tip text so it no longer instructs users to scan a QR code and instead directs them to share via the app link.

Update the Flyer experience to temporarily remove/disable QR code generation and rendering, while keeping the flyer page usable and downloadable. Specifically: remove the QR canvas from the flyer preview UI, remove QR generation state handling (ready/generating/error gating), and adjust the flyer export implementation so it can export a flyer PNG without requiring a QR canvas (the exported flyer should still include the app title/branding and the share URL).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Share dialog QR code so it reliably encodes a valid, scannable full https URL (currently scans as no data/invalid).
Temporarily remove/disable the QR code feature from the Share dialog (keep the rest of the app unchanged) and revisit adding it later.

projectName: Temporarily remove QR code from Share and Flyer flows (keep link sharing)
